trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例与其他数据类型之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FontWeightConverter> object supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontWeightConverter>对象支持转换到和从<xref:System.String>类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeightConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeightConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正被计算用于转换的源类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可将给定类型的对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert the provided type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换器可以将提供的类型转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The desired type that that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> is being evaluated for conversion to.
trans-unit.target: 为转换到而正在计算的此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例的所需类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的实例转换成不同类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换器可以转换 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的此实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the type being converted.
trans-unit.target: 正在转换的类型的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 试图将指定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> created from the converted <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据已转换的 <paramref name="value" /> 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />为 <see langword="null" />，或不是有效的转换类型。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Describes the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the type being converted.
trans-unit.target: 描述正在转换的类型的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The type this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> is converted to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的此实例所转换为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的实例转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The object created from the converted instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的已转换实例创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> i is not an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 的实例

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not a valid destination type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> 不是有效的目标类型。
